title: Microfinance institutions face debt funding squeeze
description: The pure-play microfinance lenders categorized as NBFC-MFIs saw nearly 12% less debt funding in the first quarter, according to MFIN data. Lower disbursements and external factors have worsened portfolio quality, while the total assets under management grew 23% year-on-year, but dipped slightly compared to the previous quarter.
